entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
